attributes.additional_details: Our issue is something that circles all around the world, girls as young as 8 go through menstruation,it’s a part of life and there is NOTHING women can do prevent it, so why do we have to pay for something we didn’t ask for?
attributes.background: Why is it that contraception (specifically condoms), nicotine patches, abortions and even housing is paid for by the government, but menstrual products are not?
